title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 243: Featuring Tim Stapleton + Jimmy Hayes
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Tim Stapleton and Jimmy Hayes. The boys join (53:19) to recap the Sandbagger Invitational that was released on Barstoolsports.com and our Youtube channel last week. The guys also talk some more funny Russian stories and how much Tim’s life has changed since the first time he joined the podcast. The guys then talk some NHL news, including the Winnipeg Jets, the Arizona Coyotes and RA wraps up with a Gambling Corner (02:02:34).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
